title: Agent @ Spectrum- In regards to a customers Google Pixel 4 Device
content: I am an agent in Spectrum Mobile Repair. I am working with a mutual customer whos device is having a hardware issue. She doesn't receive texts, along with other network issues. We have done troubleshooting up to a full factory reset- issue has persisted. Our leadership has approved a warranty exchange, but we cannot process those on our end. What should our customer do from here, as the Google phone support line is closed?
